name: 3 WAY
description:
3 WAY is a kind of game which you can play by spinning the bottle and trying your luck by choosing the cards and enjoying the sexy dare encounters with your girlfriends and best buddies.

Make your buddies part of the dare, earn points, and enjoy the benefits of 3 WAY fun.

So, just make sure your heart beats calm, roll the bottle and get ready for a dazzling dare.
